Visa Status – USA - H1-B immigrant                                                                                    SURBHIT AGARWAL

EXPERIENCE SUMMARY: 
 
• Certified Database  Administrator  with 12 years and 6 months of  IT  Industry  experience, 
predominately on Oracle, MongoDB (No-SQL), AWS currently working for Apple Inc. client. 
• Experience in Data Center Migration and Company Domain Change Migration Project.  
• Experience in migrating on premise database to AWS cloud. 
• Experience in SSL, TLS and Corporate Certification Migration project.

Linux/Unix.

• Worked on Oracle Golden Gate Administration/Configuration on Linux/Unix.

12cR1/R2  , 10g to 11gR1, and 11gR1 to 11gR2 . 
• Implemented Targets monitoring through OEM cloud control using Metric extension, monitoring 
template and incident rules for getting alerts on mobile / mail, resulting an on-call support shift. 
• Experience in OEM (12.1.0.4 / 12.1.0.5 / 13c ) Administration/Configuration/Upgrade project on

• Expert in Performance Tuning, SQL tuning & Capacity Monitoring.

Linux/Unix.  
• Expert in Performance Tuning, SQL tuning & Capacity Monitoring. 
• Experience in RMAN backup and recovery, planning backup strategies, doing disaster recovery drill 
on quarterly basis.    
• Experience in Database refresh / logical backup through datapump exp/imp or traditional exp/imp 
in Oracle and MongoDB . 
• Created R&D lab for learning, testing the new features of Oracle/MongoDB and presenting POC to 
the customers.   
• Good Experience in Oracle grid patching and database patching ( PSU )  
• Worked on ITIL concepts of incident management, problem management, change management and 
managed services module in various environments. 
• Built Automation scripts using bash Shell Scripting and SQL scripting. 
• Worked on the disaster recovery scenarios like loss of control file/online redo log file/data file with 
and without using flashback technology

• Worked on the disaster recovery scenarios like loss of control file/online redo log file/data file with 
and without using flashback technology  
• Experience in cloning the databases from one server to another host through DUPLICATE ACTIVE 
database, RMAN backup and traditional backup (export and import ) .  
• Worked on configuring the OEM agent on the database servers. 
• Worked on Capacity planning, space management, user management, access management, role 
management and profile management. 
• Worked on cross platform migration through Transportable tablespaces (Solaris to Linux).  
• Experience in the conversion of NON ASM database to ASM or ASM to non ASM database. 
• Knowledge in MongoDB database monitoring using Ops Manager. 
• Highly motivated team player with strong commitment to quality and customer service.

DATE  
• Designed ,Installed & Configured MongoDBDB versions 3.6  ,a multi node MongoDBDB sharded cluster 
and replica sets , Converted replicaset to sharded cluster , added /removed shards from sharded cluster.

• Supported choosing a shard key and make sure even distribution of data across multiple shards. 
• Configured SSL keyfiles on cluster, X509 user setup , OPS manager installation and configuration for 
sharded clusters , fixed chunk migration issues in large sharded cluster environment 
• Monitoring document growth and storage performance by considering multiple factors like write 
performance, including random access patterns, disk caches, disk readahead and RAID configurations. 
• Created Text Index for querying specific documents with string content, Worked on MongoDBDB backup 
thorough utilities (MongoDBDump, MongoDBRestore, MongoDBexport, MongoDBimport) manually  
• Performance tuning and monitoring of MongoDB databases using database utilities (MongoDBtop, 
MongoDBstat,  database  profile,  current-Op)  and  OPS  manager/MMS(MongoDBDB  Management 
Services).

Services).  
• Set up container (CDB) and pluggable (PDB) database, Converted Non-CDB to PDB, unplugged and 
plugged the PDB to another CDB, managed user access and privileges of multitenant databases. 
Upgrade to 19c

MAY 2018

performance issue / process abend by using GGSCI / Log dump / discard file analysis etc . 
• Implemented OGG new features such as Integrated capture or apply, native DDL capture, multi-
threaded replicate and used Oracle provided GG lag monitoring scripts using OEM.

• Implemented OGG new features such as Integrated capture or apply, native DDL capture, multi-

• Worked in setting up Security Certificates through TLS, Database Vault and SSL , upgraded TLS 1.0 to 1.2 
 
SENIOR ORACLE DATABASE ADMINISTRATOR | ADIENT | JUL 2016 – JAN 2018

gap and configuration issues  
• Worked on Transparent Data encryption (TDE)
